Class StoreTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.mityc.javasign.pkstore.StoreTests
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeyStoreTests, MITyCTests, TestIE, TestMozilla, TestMSCAPI, TestMSCAPIMITyC

    public class StoreTests
extends java.lang.Object

    Funcionalidad básica para los tests de acceso a los store.
